mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_individual_question (iq_number, user_email, iq_title, iq_content, iq_date ,iq_pass) VALUES (iq_num.NEXTVAL, #{user_email}, #{iq_title}, #{iq_content}, CURRENT_DATE, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_individual_question)*/ * FROM tbl_individual_question WHERE iq_pass = 'Y' OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_individual_question)*/ * FROM tbl_individual_question WHERE iq_pass = 'N' OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_individual_question WHERE iq_pass= #{iq_pass}
